remarks: Define the predicate "the set ` v ` is algebraically independent in the algebra ` w ` ".  A collection of vectors is algebraically independent if no nontrivial polynomial with elements from the subset evaluates to zero.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
statement:
df-algind $p |- AlgInd = ( w e. _V , k e. ~P ( Base ` w ) |-> { v e. ~P ( Base ` w ) | Fun `' ( f e. ( Base ` ( v mPoly ( w |`s k ) ) ) |-> ( ( ( ( v evalSub w ) ` k ) ` f ) ` ( _I |` v ) ) ) } ) $.
$d f k v w $.
